title: Welcome Reception
description: Mingle with other engineers, speakers, workshop instructors, and sponsors over food and drinks. Get insight from casual conversation or discuss a specific subject at the topic tables.

title: Topic Tables
description: Informal sessions to get up close and personal with speakers, workshop instructors, and other experts on a specific subject.

title: Conference Talks
description: Two days of talks heavy on content, applicability, and originality. With over 15 speakers discussing a variety of subjects, you're sure to learn many things to implement back at the office.

title: Unconference Sessions
description: Chat with speakers and other attendees in discussion sessions between the talks

title: Hiring Mixer
description: Looking for your next job? Or out to get your first? Come to the hiring mixer where you'll meet some of the Bay Area's hottest companies.

title: Workshops
description: We've secured 4 industry-leading engineers and instructors to help you learn in hours what they've mastered over years.
